title: Person Running Facing Right

verbs: Depicts the act of running or moving quickly forward.
nouns: A person in motion, running toward the right.

description: A person running toward the right, shown in mid-stride with one leg forward and arms in motion. Often represents running, exercise, racing, or moving quickly toward a goal.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person running facing right emoji shows a human figure in motion, angled to the right. The design includes natural movement and energetic posture, commonly used to symbolize running, activity, or progress.
